abstract: An earlier version of this column posted online referred imprecisely to one assertion in a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint against General Electric, and misinterpreted one aspect of the complaint at another point. The corrections reflected in this revised version are explained by Floyd Norris in a post on his blog.
lead_paragraph: An earlier version of this column posted online referred imprecisely to one assertion in a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint against General Electric, and misinterpreted one aspect of the complaint at another point. The corrections reflected in this revised version are explained by Floyd Norris in a post on his blog.
